title: Mesmerized
description: Can love really conquer all?   Swearing. Sexual Content. Mature topics. Cliffhanger. Part One of Four. Serial Romance. For 18+ Readers.  After Charity McAdams is dumped by her fiance, she is forced to move on without him, but moving on comes with its share of surprises.  Three years later, she's in a new relationship and knows that a proposal is just around the corner, but life throws her a curve ball and the man she thought she'd gotten over returns.  Brandon is now a local legend, billionaire and Hollywood A-lister, but his return isn't just about revisiting what he left behind. He is determined to win Charity back, but is Charity ready to tear down the walls she put up when he left and take him back?  You will love this contemporary new adult and college romance women's fiction story if you enjoy: - Women's fiction - Action and Adventure Romance Fiction - Celebrity Romance - Contemporary Romance - Billionaire Romance - New Adult and College Romance - Steamy Romance  Note. Swearing and sexual content. Cliffhanger. Serial romance Part 1 of 4
author: Audra Cole
